masterGrammar.rule: rule {VP option 11a - Aux Subject V for VSO languages, not passive} VP = DP V' <VP head> = <V' head> <V' head subject> = <DP> <VP head type pro-drop> = - {<V' head type transitive> = - /<V' head type transitive> = + <V' head object head type reflexive> = - } <VP head type auxiliary> = + <VP head type motion> = - <DP head type possessive> = - |subject not possessive <DP head type reflexive> = - |subject not reflexive <DP head type reciprocal> = - |subject not reciprocal <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <DP head type comma> = - <VP head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <VP head> == [type:[reciprocal:+]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <VP head> == [object:[head:[type:[reciprocal:+]]]] -> [subject:[head:[agr:[number:plural]]]] <VP head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <VP head fronted> == ~[cat:DP] <VP head infl> == ~[valence:passive] <VP option> = 11a

rule {VP option 12aexist - existential Adv initial} VP = AdvP I' <VP head> = <V' head> <VP head type existential> = + <AdvP head type existential> = + <VP head infl valence> = active <AdvP head type comma> = - <VP head type prefix> <= <AdvP head type prefix> <VP option> = 12aexist

rule {VP option 12bexist - existential Adv final} VP = V' AdvP <VP head> = <V' head> <VP head type existential> = + <AdvP head type existential> = + <VP head infl valence> = active <V' head type comma> = - <VP head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <VP head type suffix> <= <AdvP head type suffix> <VP option> = 12bexist

rule {VBar option 1 - V initial/final, intransitive} V' = V <V' head> = <V head> <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head infl valence> = active <V head type motion> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 1

rule {VBar option 2a - V initial, motion intransitive} V' = V {PP / AdvP} <V' head> = <V head> <PP head type locative> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <AdvP head type locative> = + <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head type motion> = + <V head infl valence> = active <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <V head type comma> = - <V' head type comma> <= <PP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <V' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <AdvP head type suffix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 2a

rule {VBar option 2b - V final, motion intransitive} V' = {PP / AdvP} V <V' head> = <V head> <PP head type locative> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <AdvP head type locative> = + <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head type motion> = + <V head infl valence> = active <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <PP head type comma> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <V' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <AdvP head type prefix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 2b

rule {VBar option 3a - V initial, copular} V' = V {PP / AdjP / DP} <V' head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP> <V head type copular> = + <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <V head type comma> = - <V' head type comma> <= <PP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <DP head type comma> <V' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <AdjP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3a

rule {VBar option 3aNegObjVerbRequired - V initial, copular} V' = V {PP / AdjP / DP} <V' head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP> <V head type copular> = + <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <V' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <AdjP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <V' head> == [object:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if object negative, V' must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3aNegObjVerbRequired

rule {VBar option 3aperc - V initial, perception} V' = V AdjP <V' head> = <V head> <V head type copular> = - <V head type perception> = + <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <V head type comma> = - <V' head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <V' head type suffix> <= <AdjP head type suffix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3aperc

rule {V' option 3aexist - VSO order, existential verb} V' = V DP (AdvP / PP / DP_1) <V' head> = <V head> <V head type existential> = + <V head object> = <DP> <V head agr number> = <DP head agr number> <V' head infl valence> = active <V' head type motion> = - <AdvP head type locative> = + <PP head type locative> = + <DP_1 head type locative> = + <V head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <V' head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <PP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <DP_1 head type comma> <V' head type suffix> <= <AdvP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <DP_1 head type suffix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3aexist

rule {VBar option 3b - V final, copular} V' = {PP / AdjP / DP} V <V' head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP> <V head type copular> = + <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <PP head type comma> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <V' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <AdjP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3b

rule {VBar option 3bNegObjVerbRequired - V final, copular} V' = {PP / AdjP / DP} V <V' head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP> <V head type copular> = + <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <PP head type comma> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <DP head type comma> = - <V' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <AdjP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <DP head type prefix> <V' head> == [object:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if object negative, V' must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3bNegObjVerbRequired

rule {VBar option 3bperc - V final, perception} V' = AdjP V <V' head> = <V head> <V head type copular> = - <V head type perception> = + <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <V' head type prefix> <= <AdjP head type prefix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3bperc

rule {V' option 3bexist - OSV order, existential verb} V' = (AdvP / PP / DP_1) DP V <V' head> = <V head> <V head type existential> = + <V head object> = <DP> <V head agr number> = <DP head agr number> <V' head infl valence> = active <V' head type motion> = - <AdvP head type locative> = + <PP head type locative> = + <DP_1 head type locative> = + <DP head type comma> = - <AdvP head type comma> = - <PP head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <V' head type prefix> <= <AdvP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <DP_1 head type prefix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3bexist

rule {VBar option 3c - copular sentence, no verb} V' = {PP / AdjP / DP} <V' head> = <PP head> <V' head> = <AdjP head> <V' head> = <DP head> <V' head type verbheaded> = - | to restrict recursion <V' head type transitive> = - <V' head type pro-drop> = - <V' head type auxiliary> = + <PP head type sentential> = - <DP head type pronoun> = - | to restrict pronouns <DP head type quantifier> = - | to restrict quantifiers <PP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <PP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - <AdjP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <AdjP head type suffix copular> = - <V' head type copular> <= + <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3c

rule {V' option 3cexist - VSO order, existential, no verb} V' = DP (AdvP / PP / DP_1) <V' head> = <DP head> <V head type existential> = + <V' head infl valence> = active <V' head type motion> = - <AdvP head type locative> = + <PP head type locative> = + <DP_1 head type locative> = + <V' head type comma> <= <AdvP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <PP head type comma> <V' head type comma> <= <DP_1 head type comma> <V' head type suffix> <= <AdvP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <PP head type suffix> <V' head type suffix> <= <DP_1 head type suffix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3cexist

rule {V' option 3dexist - OSV order, existential, no verb} V' = (AdvP / PP / DP_1) DP <V' head> = <DP head> <V' head infl valence> = active <V' head type motion> = - <AdvP head type locative> = + <PP head type locative> = + <DP_1 head type locative> = + <AdvP head type comma> = - <PP head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <V' head type prefix> <= <AdvP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <PP head type prefix> <V' head type prefix> <= <DP_1 head type prefix> <V' head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <V' option> = 3dexist
